name: Word Play Quiz: Add A Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text: Crack in the bill of a bird.
A small alcohol-producing device designed to fit on the edge of a window.
The peskiest kid at a summer getaway for children.
This is a hard one! Meteorological conditions for a neutered male goat.
questions.explanation:
Wether weather.

	Congratulations if you got this one!

questions.text: A small piece of a large reddish-brown organ used as food.
Small skin parasites on frozen water.
Point of a fork made of Sn.
The width of the space between the open jaws of a chimpanzee.
Possesses a dish made of potatoes and corned beef.
